paragraph: Call us at (619) 550-1355 for a free case review.

detailsData.title: Trial Ready
detailsData.content: We are always prepared to take cases to trial, ensuring maximum compensation for our clients.

detailsData.title: Unmatched Experience
detailsData.content: With over 20 years of experience, we have a proven track record of success in personal injury cases.

detailsData.title: Compassion
detailsData.content: We genuinely care about our clients and their families, providing personalized attention and care.

address: 275 W Market St #1000, San Diego, CA 92101
companyName: Hamparyan Personal Injury Lawyers San Diego
subHeading: One of California's most active and successful accident law firms.
valueProp: Hamparyan Personal Injury Lawyers San Diego is dedicated to providing top-notch legal representation to accident victims, ensuring they receive the justice and compensation they deserve.

testimonalData.text: I recently had a wonderful experience working with Robert and his team. They guided me through the entire process with care and compassion.
testimonalData.author: Sharan D.

testimonalData.text: The lawyers at this firm are professional and experienced. They truly care about their clients and work tirelessly to protect their rights.
testimonalData.author: Alan P.

testimonalData.text: Robert agreed to take on my difficult case and represented me with dedication. I highly recommend him for his professionalism and kindness.
testimonalData.author: Denise Odion
